hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select count(1) as ORDER_NUM from Et_Task ET where 1=1 and etta_status in (:statuses) and etta_Carrier_Issued = :carrierIssued <<and ET.create_time > :createTimeFrom>> <<and ET.create_time < :createTimeTo>> and <@dataFilter Table="HLS_ES_COMPANY_CODE" field= "COMPANY_CODE" alias="ET" />
